entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as feeling a strange twinge of annoyance when Ginny walks away. He is also surrounded by mesmerized girls who greet him.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as not hanging around with Harry, Ron, and Hermione while at school.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone Ginny does not hang around with while at school.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone Ginny does not hang around with while at school.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as a round-faced boy struggling towards Harry.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is described as having long hair and large, misty eyes. She is clutching a magazine to her chest.

relationships.description: Harry feels annoyed when Ginny walks away.
Neville greets Harry with a familiar voice.
Harry greets Luna warmly and asks how she is doing.
